headline: Is CMS Energy (CMS) Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Strength?
summary: If you are wondering whether CMS Energy is fairly priced right now, you are not alone. Many investors are asking if the recent moves in the share price line up with the underlying value. The stock closed at US$76.74, with returns of 5.4% over 7 days, 7.1% over 30 days, 9.0% year to date, 14.0% over 1 year, 35.2% over 3 years and 58.6% over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about what is already reflected in the price. Recent news around regulated utilities, capital investment in...
